vogar.util

Class TimeUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • vogar.util.TimeUtilities

  • public class TimeUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities to make it easier to work with ISO 8601 dates and times. This is a subset of the original class from http://software.jessies.org/salma-hayek/ --- please submit fixes upstream.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private TimeUtilities() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String msToIsoString(long duration)
      Returns the ISO 8601-format String corresponding to the given duration (measured in milliseconds).
      static java.lang.String msToString(long ms)
      Returns a string representation of the given number of milliseconds.
      static double nsToS(long ns)
      Converts nanoseconds into (fractional) seconds.
      static java.lang.String nsToString(long ns)
      Returns a string representation of the given number of nanoseconds.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
